summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: depthEnable
param.para: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable depth testing (TRUE for enabled, FALSE for disabled).

param.name: depthWriteMask
param.para: A D3D11_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK-typed value that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer that can be modified by depth data.

param.name: depthFunc
param.para: A D3D11_COMPARISON_FUNC-typed value that identifies a function that compares depth data against existing depth data.

param.name: stencilEnable
param.para: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable stencil testing (TRUE for enabled, FALSE for disabled).

param.name: stencilReadMask
param.para: An 8-bit mask that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for reading stencil data.

param.name: stencilWriteMask
param.para: An 8-bit mask that identifies a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for writing stencil data.

param.name: frontStencilFailOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera.

param.name: frontStencilDepthFailOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera.

param.name: frontStencilPassOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera.

param.name: frontStencilFunc
param.para: A D3D11_COMPARISON_FUNC-typed value that identifies a function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera.

param.name: backStencilFailOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.

param.name: backStencilDepthFailOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.

param.name: backStencilPassOp
param.para: A D3D11_STENCIL_OP-typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.

param.name: backStencilFunc
param.para: A D3D11_COMPARISON_FUNC-typed value that identifies a function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera.

remarks.para: Here is how CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC assigns the provided values to the members of D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC:

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that is initialized with default depth-stencil-state values.

remarks.para: Here are the default depth-stencil-state values for the members of :

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that is initialized with a D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Address of the D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure that initializes the D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC structure.
